// Data import dataTableData from "layouts/ecommerce/referral/data/dataTableData"; import breakpoints from "assets/theme/base/breakpoints"; // Images import officeDark from "assets/images/office-dark.jpg"; const image1 = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creativetimofficial/public-assets/master/soft-ui-design-system/assets/img/window-desk.jpg"; function Referral() { const { values } = breakpoints; return ( general statistics Referral Program Track and find all the details about our referral program, your stats and revenues. ); } export default Referral;
